original: intros valid_s find_i_s msg_in_soup. eapply (@no_msg_from_to_consume' from to (fun x => fun=> x == tg) s i). -- apply valid_s. -- unfold msg_in_soup' in msg_in_soup. destruct msg_in_soup as (uniq_i & Hcond). intros j t c Hfind contra. specialize (Hcond j c). assert (j = i). ++ simpl in uniq_i. destruct uniq_i as (i' & c' & Hi'_eq & Hi_unique). rewrite <- (proj2 (Hi_unique _ _ Hfind) i) in Hi'_eq. rewrite Hi'_eq in Hfind_i_s. inversion Hfind_i_s; subst. reflexivity. ++ subst j. specialize (Hcond Hfind_i_s). rewrite eq_refl in contra. discriminate contra.
